original_title: 2012 San Francisco Giants: The Official World Series Film
overview: There was no torture this time. There was a special season. The San Francisco Giants clinched their eighth National League West Division title and then faced elimination six times in a thrilling 2012 Postseason run. Six times they rose up in victory, battling to a World Series championship. Together they were Giants. Together they are champions.
tagline: There was no torture this time, only magic
title: 2012 San Francisco Giants: The Official World Series Film
